examples.example: 我很喜欢那里，留下了许多美好的回忆。

translate.english: I like there very much and have left many wonderful memories.

examples.example: 远方的那里有我一直向往的美丽风景。

translate.english: There in the distance is the beautiful scenery that I have always been longing for.

examples.example: 我渴望去远方的那里，探索未知的精彩世界。

translate.english: I am eager to go to the distant there and explore the unknown wonderful world.
